title: Devourer Diana
body: Would devourer Diana be somewhat viable? Then building hextech gunblade then maybe a  guinsoo rageblade?

replies.body:
I'm no Diana player, but I reckon she benefits so much more from the early power spike in runic echoes to snowball herself/her lanes. I wouldn't really wanna see a Diana on my team afk farming the jungle...
Heck if I didn't build runic I would go for cinderhulk as second choice if I had a stinker of an early game..

But again, I haven't played Diana since her release

My question is what kind of benefit does Devourer give, and is it worth delaying your power spike for? Does it offer any synergy within her kit, generally on hit effects?

The truth is while Diana may gain additional magic damage every 3rd auto attack, she actually doesn't usually sit around to repeatedly spam that.  She's not like Jax that can deal high sustained damage but rather insane burst damage. Furthermore Devourer not only delays your power spike but puts you at greater risk of being counter jungled due to you lacking burst that you would have with Runic Echoes.
